title: Neurodiversity-Inclusive Management Leadership Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental business concepts and foundational leadership experience
context.additional_context: Customized accessibility design for neurodiverse learners, optimized for smartphone-based learning activities.

learning_goals: Learners can understand the work characteristics of neurodiverse team members and explain three or more effective communication strategies.
A practical plan can be developed to progressively enhance leadership competencies through the application of the GRR model
Real-world business cases can be analyzed through simulation-based problem-solving activities in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
